bundled.title: Snuggle Little Wombat
bundled.description: A gentle bedtime story about a little wombat getting ready for sleep with cozy snuggles and sweet dreams.

bundled.title: The Sleepy Forest
bundled.description: In a peaceful forest, all the woodland creatures settle down for a cozy night's sleep.

bundled.title: Moonlight Lullaby
bundled.description: The moon sings a gentle lullaby to all the sleepy children around the world.

bundled.title: Treasure Island Adventure
bundled.description: Join Captain Pip on an exciting journey to find hidden treasure on a mysterious island.

bundled.title: The Great Mountain Climb
bundled.description: Follow brave little goat as she climbs the tallest mountain to see the sunrise.

bundled.title: Jungle Explorer
bundled.description: Explore the jungle and meet amazing animals with young explorer Leo.

bundled.title: The Butterfly Garden
bundled.description: Discover the magical life cycle of butterflies in a beautiful garden.

bundled.title: Ocean Friends
bundled.description: Dive deep into the ocean and meet colorful fish, playful dolphins, and gentle whales.

bundled.title: A Walk in the Forest
bundled.description: Take a peaceful walk through the forest and discover its hidden wonders.

bundled.title: Best Friends Forever
bundled.description: Bear and Bunny learn what it means to be true friends through thick and thin.

bundled.title: Sharing is Caring
bundled.description: Little Fox learns the joy of sharing with friends at the forest picnic.

bundled.title: Making a New Friend
bundled.description: Shy Rabbit learns how to make friends at the playground.

bundled.title: Counting Stars
bundled.description: Learn to count from 1 to 10 by counting twinkling stars in the night sky.

bundled.title: Rainbow Colors
bundled.description: Discover all the colors of the rainbow with playful animals.

bundled.title: ABC Adventure
bundled.description: Learn the alphabet with fun animals from A to Z.

bundled.title: The Fairy Garden
bundled.description: Visit a magical garden where fairies dance and flowers sing.

bundled.title: My Dragon Friend
bundled.description: Meet a friendly dragon who loves to play and share adventures.

bundled.title: Unicorn Dreams
bundled.description: Journey to a magical land where unicorns make dreams come true.

cms_only.description: A magical bedtime story about a child who rides on starlight to visit dream worlds.

cms_only.title: The Pirate's Secret
cms_only.description: Discover the secret treasure map and sail the seven seas with Captain Ruby.

cms_only.description: Help save the rainforest animals and learn about protecting our planet.

cms_only.description: Join the Kindness Club and spread joy through acts of kindness.

cms_only.title: Little Science Explorer
cms_only.description: Discover amazing science facts through fun experiments and exploration.

cms_only.description: Experience the magic of your first day at wizard school with new friends and spells.
